title: Good agricultural practice | Wikipedia audio article

tasks.task: Implement Good Agricultural Practices (GAP) for farm production and post-production to ensure food safety and sustainability.
Apply GAP in the United States Department of Agriculture (USDA) GAP and GHP Program.
Execute soil management practices according to GAP.
Implement water management strategies per GAP.
Ensure animal health, welfare, and care as per GAP.
Maintain traceability and quality assurance in production.
Implement Good Agricultural Practices (GAP) for farm production and post-production to ensure food safety and sustainability.

The main task based on the transcript is **MAINTASK: Implement Good Agricultural Practices (GAP) for farm production and post-production to ensure food safety and sustainability**. This involves several subtasks:
Implement Good Agricultural Practices (GAP) for farm production and post-production to ensure food safety and sustainability.
